code: import React,{Component}from"react";import"./Skills.css";import SoftwareSkill from"../../components/softwareSkills/SoftwareSkill";import{skills}from"../../portfolio";import{Fade}from"react-reveal";import DataScienceImg from"./DataScienceImg";import FullStackImg from"./FullStackImg";import CloudInfraImg from"./CloudInfraImg";import DesignImg from"./DesignImg";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function GetSkillSvg(props){if(props.fileName==="DataScienceImg")return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DataScienceImg,{theme:props.theme});else if(props.fileName==="FullStackImg")return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FullStackImg,{theme:props.theme});else if(props.fileName==="CloudInfraImg")return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CloudInfraImg,{theme:props.theme});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DesignImg,{theme:props.theme});}class SkillSection extends Component{render(){const theme=this.props.theme;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:skills.data.map((skill,i)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skills-main-div",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fade,{left:true,duration:2000,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"skills-image-div",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(GetSkillSvg,{fileName:skill.fileName,theme:theme})})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"skills-text-div",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fade,{right:true,duration:1000,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"skills-heading",style:{color:theme.text},children:skill.title})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fade,{right:true,duration:1500,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SoftwareSkill,{logos:skill.softwareSkills})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Fade,{right:true,duration:2000,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:skill.skills.map((skillSentence,i)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"subTitle skills-text",style:{color:theme.secondaryText},children:skillSentence},i);})})})]})]},i);})});}}export default SkillSection;
